name: Bird Butt Battle Royale
description:
Can you get warm under the large buttocks long enough to fly free?
Try to survive the nest and be the Last Egg Standing in Bird Butt Battle Royale!

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to control

Game made by
Tyler Rhodes (https://twitter.com/TylerRhodesArt)
Valentina Hawes (https://twitter.com/xValociraptor)

With music provided by
Ninja Ropes (https://twitter.com/moonphaizer)
Listen to the theme here!
https://soundcloud.com/ninjaropes/bird-butt-battle-royale-theme-song
